DESCRIPTION: You cannot lose more than a given amount of HP in a single turn. NL At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented HP loss, remove it.
Orb: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
Stance: If you have less than 6 Plated Armor at the start of your turn, gain 2 Plated Armor. NL When you leave this Stance, gain 1 Artifact.
